requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 8130U(2Cores, 2.3GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (64bit) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i7 (64bit) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

results.name: A Bad Day To Be a Hero
